name: To Return (3/10)
description:
Charlotte climbed the Tower of God's, and had her soul split in two. The two half's of her soul must return to the top of the tower in order to become one, and make her hole again.

(This game was made for the "Make 10 Short Games! Variety Magajam 2020".)

--Controls--

Arrow keys - move

Space - select/delete

M - mute

Esc - Exit
